Self management program diabetes target self-empowerment tool find effective study , typically included individual Medicaid . Our goal trial observe patient participate program could decrease glycated hemoglobin level , improve health status improve self-care practice .
DOC.brief_title: Diabetes Health Enhancement Program Improve Health People With Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: Design , Setting Population : A Phase 3 , one year prospective trial , randomize intervention control ( usual care ) Medicaid dual-Medicare beneficiary , diabetes , age 40-85 year old reside South King County , Washington . Intervention : A targeted , multi-component , self-management program incorporate stage-of-change approach overcome barrier facilitate life-style behavior change achieve patient-driven health action plan nutrition exercise goal . Main Outcome Measures : Glycemic control ( HbA1c ) , physical mental health , self-care practice . Recruitment Status : Completed : participant longer recruit ; data analysis complete .
DOC.criteria: Insured Medicaid ( SSI ) dual enrol Medicaid Medicare least one year Diagnosed type 1 type 2 diabetes least 1 year ( > 1 inpatient > 2 outpatient visit ICD9 cod 250.00250.9x , prescription insulin and/or oral hyperglycemic medication ) Aged 4085 year Geographically close Southeast Senior Center South King County , Washington , primary care provider ( HMO ) . Serious kidney disease ( serum creatinine > 2.5 endstage renal disease ) Other serious illness would preclude oneyear study participation ( dementia , terminal illness , organ transplantation ) Pregnancy Inability give informed consent .
